selections.name: The Dulce Tacha
selections.reason: Fastest qualifier in the trials with a 79 speed figure. Trainer Fales and Jockey Americano have a 25% strike rate. Broke well and held nicely in the trial.

selections.name: Bf Dulce Sin Rage
selections.reason: Won trial heat with a 71 speed figure. The outside post (10) is a significant advantage in Quarter Horse sprints to avoid traffic.

selections.name: Not Any Dynasty
selections.reason: Finished 2nd in trial with a respectable 69 speed figure. Late gain indicates potential to improve.

danger_horse.name: Apollitical Blue
danger_horse.reason: Consistent speed figures in the high 60s, could hit the board if the top two falter.

selections.name: Chica Tigre
selections.reason: Shows the best route form (59 speed figure on turf). The switch to dirt is a question, but the distance experience is superior to the field of sprinters.

selections.name: Scarlett Letter
selections.reason: Speedy type stretching out. If she clears early in this weak field, she could steal it, though stamina is unproven.

selections.name: Miss Madame
selections.reason: Consistent closer in sprints. Should appreciate the added distance and save ground from the inside.

danger_horse.name: Clam Beach
danger_horse.reason: Finished 2nd last out, but speed figures are lower than the top contenders.

selections.name: Under Contract
selections.reason: Coming off a win with a 75 speed figure. In sharp current form compared to others dropping in class but showing poor recent efforts.

selections.name: Slew O' Mischief
selections.reason: Taking a massive class drop from $16k claimers to $8.5k. Recent form is dull (60 speed), but back class (81 speed) makes him dangerous at this level.

selections.name: Chicken Wing
selections.reason: Has high back numbers (83 speed), but returning from a 9-month layoff makes him a vulnerable play for the win.

danger_horse.name: The Scent
danger_horse.reason: Consistent mid-pack runner who picks up pieces. Good for exotics.

selections.name: Mr Fabricator
selections.reason: Dominant win at this distance last out with an 87 speed figure. The Silva/Americano combination is potent (25% win).

selections.name: Street Vendor
selections.reason: Consistent closer with an 89 speed figure last out. Will be running late if the pace heats up.

selections.name: Magoo
selections.reason: Won last out with an 84 speed figure. Good current form and fits well in this class.

danger_horse.name: Brown Town
danger_horse.reason: Posted a huge 98 speed figure on a 'Good' track last out. Bounce candidate or regression likely on Fast dirt.

selections.name: Mo Grey
selections.reason: Ran a 64 speed figure on dirt three starts back, which is superior to the recent dirt form of his rivals. Turf form hides his dirt ability.

selections.name: Oswald
selections.reason: AE runner who draws in due to scratches. Consistent mid-50s speed figures on dirt make him a primary contender in this weak field.

selections.name: Nitro Boost
selections.reason: Proven dirt form (49-54 speed figures). Will likely be forwardly placed.

danger_horse.name: Manx Missile
danger_horse.reason: Turf runner switching to dirt. If he transfers his turf form, he is a threat.

selections.name: Hail State
selections.reason: Consistent form with a 77 speed figure last out. Stalking style fits the race shape well.

selections.name: Racer Rex
selections.reason: Solid 78 speed figure last out. Drops into a very winnable spot.

selections.name: Taino House
selections.reason: Has early speed and the rail. Could hold on for a share if left alone early.

danger_horse.name: Saint Pio
danger_horse.reason: Ran a 79 speed figure recently. Inconsistent but capable on his best day.

selections.name: Djoser
selections.reason: Coming off a strong win with an 83 speed figure. With the scratch of the morning line favorite (#7), he becomes the clear horse to beat.

selections.name: Crusher Royale
selections.reason: Consistent 80 speed figure last out. Should be closing late to fill the exacta.

selections.name: My Vino
selections.reason: Solid turf form (73 speed). Good value for the lower rungs of the exotics.

danger_horse.name: The Man The Myth
danger_horse.reason: Has back class but recent form is slightly below the top two.

selections.name: In A Pickle
selections.reason: Significant class drop from Maiden Special Weight/MCL $25k to $12.5k. Speed figure of 50 is competitive here.

selections.name: Global Agenda
selections.reason: Showed good early speed last out. Should be involved from the break.

selections.name: Valentine Rocks
selections.reason: Dropping in class. 45 speed figure puts him in the mix for a minor award.

danger_horse.name: Bold Prospect
danger_horse.reason: First time starter with unknown potential, watch the tote board.
